代理的委任及本協議的有效期: 現按照本協議的條款並在該等條款的規限下委任
則即使物業在有效期內並非經由
賣方仍可能須向代理支付佣金
因此當賣方與代理建立獨家代理關係時應謹慎考慮
代理以獨家代理身分行事時須履行的特別責任
條下以額外條款的形式指明。
代理關係及代理的責任: 代理與賣方同意 —
<ol type="a">
• 代理與賣方之間就物業而有的代理關係屬(2)關係
• 如屬雙邊代理關係，則代理須在切實可行的範圍內，盡快以書面向賣方披露代理將向買方收取的佣金的數額或收費率；
• 如屬有可能代表雙方的代理關係，則代理須在建立雙邊代理關係後，在切實可行的範圍內，盡快以書面向賣方披露該代理關係以及代理將向買方收取的佣金的數額或收費率 ； 及
• 代理除須履行本協議或任何成文法則委予代理的責任外，亦須履行本協議附表 1 內所列的 責任。
放盤價[注意：賣方並沒有藉本條授權代理代賣方接受任何要約。放盤價只供放盤及作廣告: 只在賣方的書面指示下方可更改
而該等指示將構成本協議一部分。
佣金: 本協議適用於賣方須向代理支付的佣金的規定
物業資料: 代理須向賣方提供《 地產代理常規
一般責任及香港住宅物業
填妥和簽署的物業資料表格
視察物業: • 賣方容許於雙方議定的時間查看物業。
• 賣方將物業的鎖匙交由代理妥為保管，以供查看物業之用。
• 賣方授權代理將鎖匙交予 ，以供查看物業之用。
分銷放盤: • 賣方授權代理將物業分銷放盤，並將由賣方提供的關於賣方及物業的資料交予其他地產代理以供分銷放盤之用。
• 如代理將物業交由另一地產代理( “分銷放盤代理” )分銷放盤則代理須確保分銷放盤代理遵守《地產代理常規一般責任及香港住宅物業規例》中關於廣告宣傳的規定。
廣告宣傳: • 賣方授權代理發出關於物業的廣告。
• 如對以上問題的回答是 “同意” 的話，則除本協議另有指明外，廣告宣傳費將由代理承擔。
代理須披露權益: <ol type="a">
• 代表代理簽署本協議的人現披露 ： 他或其指明親屬 (5) ， 或其任何代名人 ， 或其指明親屬的任何代名人， 或代理或代理的任何僱員 / 大股東 (6) / 合夥人 / 董事對物業金錢上的或其他實益的權益 (7) ：
• 如對以上問題的回答是 “ 有 ” 的話 ， 則必須在本協議附表 3 述明有關權益的詳情。
• 代表代理簽署本協議的人須在切實可行的範圍內 ， 盡快以書面向賣方披露在有效期內產生的上述 (a) 段所提述的任何權益。
賣方的確認: 賣方確認他已 —
• 閱讀並明白本協議的條款 ； 及
附表: 本協議的附表構成本協議的一部分。
如物業不容許作住宅用途則本協議即屬無效: 如物業的佔用許可證所規定的用途並不包括住宅用途或不容許作住宅用途 ， 則本協議即屬無效。

Appointment of Agent and Validity Period: subject to and in accordance with the terms of this Agreement to act as
This Agreement shall take effect on
In the case of exclusive agency

the Vendor may be liable to pay commission to the Agent even if the Property is not sold through the Agent within the Validity Period.The Vendor should therefore consider carefully when he enters into an exclusive agency relationship with the Agent.Special obligations to be performed by the Agent under exclusive agency may be specified as extra terms under clause
Agency Relationship and Duties of Agent: The Agent agrees with the Vendor that —
<ol type="a">
• the agency relationship between them in respect of the Property shall be a(2)
• in the case of dual agency, the Agent shall as soon as is practicable disclose in writing to the Vendor the amount or rate of commission to be received by the Agent from a purchaser;

• in the case of potentially dual agency, the Agent shall as soon as is practicable after dual agency arises disclose in writing to the Vendor such agency relationship and the amount or rate of commission to be received by the Agent from a purchaser; and
• The Agent’s duties shall be as set out in Schedule 1 to this Agreement, in addition to the duties placed on the Agent by this Agreement or any enactment.
List Price [CAUTION: The Vendor does not: The list price shall be Hong Kong Dollar
The list price can only be varied with written instructions of the Vendor and such instructions shall form part of this Agreement.
Commission: The provisions of this Agreement applicable to the commission to be paid by the Vendor to the Agent shall be as set out in Schedules
Property Information: The Agent shall provide to the Vendor the Property Information Form including the Vendor’s Statement prescribed under the Estate Agents Practice
(
General Duties and Hong Kong Residential Properties
)
Regulation duly completed and signed by the Agent.
Property Inspection: • The Vendorto allow viewing of the Property by theat a mutually agreeable time.
• The Vendorto pass the keys of the Property to the Agent for safe custody and for the viewing of the Property.
• The Vendorthe Agent to pass the keys to other estatefor the viewing of the Property.
Sub-listing: • The Vendorthe Agent to sub-list the Property and pass relevant information about the Vendor and the Property supplied by the Vendor to other estate agents for sub-listing purposes.

• If the Agent sub-lists the Property to another estate agent (“sub-listing agent”), the Agent shall ensure that the sub-listing agent shall observe the Estate Agents Practice (General Duties and Hong Kong Residential Properties) Regulation regarding advertising.
Advertising: • The Vendorthe Agent to issue advertisement in respect of the Property.
• If the answer to the above is “yes”, then the advertising fees will be borne by the Agent unless otherwise specified in this Agreement.
Disclosure of Interest by Agent: <ol type="a">

• The person signing this Agreement on behalf of the Agent discloses that he or his specified relative (5), or anynominee of his or of his specified relative, or the Agent or any employee/substantial shareholder(6) /partner/director of the Agenta pecuniary or other beneficial interest(7) in the Property.
• If the answer to the above is “yes”, then the particulars of the interest must be specified in Schedule 3 to this Agreement.

• The person signing this Agreement on behalf of the Agent shall as soon as is practicable disclose in writing to the Vendor any interest referred to in paragraph (a) above that may arise during the Validity Period.
Acknowledgement by Vendor: The Vendor acknowledges that he has —
• read and understood the terms of this Agreement; and
Schedules: The Schedules to this Agreement form part of this Agreement.
Agreement void if domestic purpose or us: This Agreement shall be void if the occupation permit for the Property does not include or allow domestic purpose or use.

代理的委任及本協議的有效期: 現按照本協議的條款並在該等條款的規限下
代理關係及代理的責任: 代理與買方同意 —
<ol type="a">
• 代理與買方之間就物業而有的代理關係屬(2)關係
• 如屬雙邊代理關係，則代理須在切實可行的範圍內，盡快以書面向買方披露代理將向買方收取的佣金的數額或收費率；
• 如屬有可能代表雙方的代理關係，則代理須在建立雙邊代理關係後，在切實可行的範圍內，盡快以書面向買方披露該代理關係以及代理將向賣方收取的佣金的數額或收費率 ； 及
• 代理除須履行本協議或任何成文法則委予代理的責任外，亦須履行本協議附表2內所列的責任。
佣金: 本協議適用於買方須向代理支付的佣金的規定
物業資料: 代理須向買方提供《 地產代理常規
一般責任及香港住宅物業
填妥和簽署的物業資料表格
• 如屬單邊代理關係，該等表格須向各別賣方的持牌地產代理取得；
• 如屬雙邊代理關係，或在賣方並沒有持牌地產代理代表的情況下，該等表格須由代理填妥和簽署，但如買方明確表示放棄收取該等表格的權利則代理無須提供有關表格。
但如買方明確表示放棄收取任何該等表格的權利，則代理無須提供有關表格。
代理須披露權益: <ol type="a">
• 代表代理簽署本協議的人現披露 ： 他或其指明親屬 (5) ， 或其任何代名人 ， 或其指明親屬的任何代名人， 或代理或代理的任何僱員 / 大股東 (6) / 合夥人 / 董事對物業金錢上的或其他實益的權益 (7) ：
• 如對以上問題的回答是 “ 有 ” 的話 ， 則必須在本協議附表 3 述明有關權益的詳情。
• 代表代理簽署本協議的人須在切實可行的範圍內 ， 盡快以書面向買方披露在有效期內產生的上述 (a) 段所提述的任何權益。
買方的確認: 買方確認他已 —
• 閱讀並明白本協議的條款 ； 及
附表: 本協議的附表構成本協議的一部分。
如物業不容許作住宅用途則本協議即屬無效: 如物業的佔用許可證所規定的用途並不包括住宅用途或不容許作住宅用途 ， 則本協議即屬無效。

Appointment of Agent and Validity Period: subject to and in accordance with the terms of this Agreement to act as
agent in the intended purchase of the properties listed in Schedule 1 to this Agreement (“Properties”).This Agreement shall take effect on
It is recommended that the Validity Period should be not more than
Agency Relationship and Duties of Agent: The Agent agrees with the Purchaser that —
<ol type="a">
• the agency relationship between them in respect of the Property shall be a(2)as specified in column 4 of Schedule 1 to this Agreement;

• in the case of each dual agency, the Agent shall as soon as is practicable disclose in writing to the Purchaser the amount or rate of commission to be received by the Agent from the relevant vendor;

• in the case of each potentially dual agency, the Agent shall as soon as is practicable after dual agency arises disclose in writing to the Purchaser such agency relationship and the amount or rate of commission to be received by the Agent from the relevant vendor; and
• The Agent’s duties shall be as set out in Schedule 2 to this Agreement, in addition to the duties placed on the Agent by this Agreement or any enactment.
Commission: The provisions of this Agreement applicable to the commission to be paid by the Purchaser to the Agent shall be as(4)
Property Information: The Agent shall provide to the Purchaser in respect of the Properties all relevant Property Information Forms including Vendor’s Statements prescribed under the Estate Agents Practice
(
General Duties and Hong Kong Residential Properties
) Regulation —
<ol type="a">
• obtained from the respective vendors’ licensed estate agents in the case of single agency；
• duly completed and signed by the Agent in the case of dual agency or where a vendor is not represented by a licensed estate agent,
unless the Purchaser expressly waives his right to receive any of them.
Disclosure of Interest by Agent: <ol type="a">

• The person signing this Agreement on behalf of the Agent discloses that he or his specified relative (5), or anynominee of his or of his specified relative, or the Agent or any employee/substantial shareholder(6) /partner/director of the Agenta pecuniary or other beneficial interest(7) in the Property.
• If the answer to the above is “yes”, then the particulars of the interest must be specified in Schedule 3 to this Agreement.

• The person signing this Agreement on behalf of the Agent shall as soon as is practicable disclose in writing to the Purchaser any interest referred to in paragraph (a) above that may arise during the Validity Period.
Acknowledgement by Purchaser: The Purchaser acknowledges that he has —
• read and understood the terms of this Agreement; and
Schedules: The Schedules to this Agreement form part of this Agreement.
Agreement void if domestic purpose or us: This Agreement shall be void with regard to a property listed in Schedule 1 if the occupation permit for that property does not include or allow domestic purpose or use.

• The person signing this Agreement on behalf of the Agent discloses that he or his specified relative (5), or anynominee of his or of his specified relative, or the Agent or any employee/substantial shareholder(6) /partner/director of the Agenta pecuniary or other beneficial interest(7) in the Property.
• If the answer to the above is “yes”, then the particulars of the interest must be specified in Schedule 3 to this Agreement.

• The person signing this Agreement on behalf of the Agent shall as soon as is practicable disclose in writing to the Purchaser any interest referred to in paragraph (a) above that may arise during the Validity Period.

客戶聲明: 本人(等)已參閱並明白及同意以下條款:—
• 本人(等)不須支付任何費用予經絡及有權拒絕接受本公司介紹的銀行/金融機構貸款。
• 本人(等)確認上述資料均屬正確並授權本公司可將本人(等)之個人資料轉介至本人(等)所選之銀行/金融機構，以便有關銀行/金融機構可直接聯絡本人(等)辦理貸款申請手續。

• 本人(等)明確表示同意及授權本公司代表本人(等)為轉介目的跟進及轉遞本人(等)向銀行/金融機構提交的申請及向銀行/金融機構收取有關本人(等)的申請進度資料。
    本人(等)亦授權銀行/金融機構接受經絡轉介及利用此表格所載之個人資料與本人(等)直接聯繫及向經絡發放有關本人(等)的申請進度的資料。
• 本人(等)明白銀行/金融機構對貸款事宜擁有最終批核權。
• 如本人(等)接受任何一間由本公司介紹之銀行/金融機構貸款，本人(等)明白並同意將會本公司獲得該銀行之介紹費。

• 除非於下述選項中提出反對，本人(等)同意在貸款提取後只有申請人（1）獲得並接受本公司之會籍並同意使用及/或轉移本人(等)之個人資料（包括姓名、電話號碼及電郵地址）用作處理會員申請和提供會員福利、優惠、服務、活動及/或獎賞的用途（詳情載於本公司的網頁）及/或本公司私隱政策聲明內所列之其他第三方(下稱「其他第三方」)作直接促銷，本人（等）明白即使已同意經絡使用及/或轉移本人（等）之個人資料至本公司及/或其他第三方，本人(等)仍有權隨時要求本公司在不收費的情況下停止使用及/或轉移本人(等)之個人資料至本公司及/或其他第三方作前述用途，詳情可參考本公司之私隱政策聲明。
